# cds-navbar-dropdown



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                  | Type                                 | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `active`    | `active`    | The dropdown visibility                                      | `boolean`                            | `false`     |
| `heading`   | `heading`   | Heading                                                      | `string`                             | `undefined` |
| `hoverable` | `hoverable` | The dropdown will show up when hovering the dropdown-trigger | `boolean`                            | `false`     |
| `isTab`     | `is-tab`    | Is Tab style                                                 | `boolean`                            | `undefined` |
| `position`  | `position`  | Dropdown Position                                            | `"center" \| "left" \| "right"`      | `'left'`    |
| `size`      | `size`      | Size                                                         | `"fullwidth" \| "large" \| "normal"` | `'normal'`  |


## Events

| Event     | Description      | Type               |
| --------- | ---------------- | ------------------ |
| `updated` | On Updated Event | `CustomEvent<any>` |

| ---- | ----------- |
|      | Content     |
